name: Cop Monster Trucks Vs Zombies - Desert Police Free Shooting Racing Game
name_original: Cop Monster Trucks Vs Zombies - Desert Police Free Shooting Racing Game
description:
Meltdown!! Zombie Clans have infested the Desert and they are out to get the Sheriff! Leap aboard your armed Monster Cop Truck, crank up that speed, check your ammo and meet the Zombies head on in this crazy race for your life game.

Slam your Monster Truck through the Aztec Desert terrain, wipe out the hungry marauding Zombies, avoid the mutated Cactus, or just blast them all back to the netherworld! Your truck is not gonna withstand the pressure, so make sure you collect all the coins to upgrade to a meaner machine.

Check out the GameCenter leaderboards, are you the hottest Cop in Town or did the Zombies claim your territory?

Features

- 2 mean Monster Truck Machine Upgrades
- Ultimate Racing Action
- Carve your way across Zombie infested Desert
- GameCenter enabled for you to race the world
